Plot: Taken aback by his mother's wedding announcement, a young man returns home in an effort to stop her from marrying his old high school gym teacher, a man who made high school hell for generations of students.
Title: Mr. Woodcock
Actors: Billy Bob Thornton, Seann William Scott, Susan Sarandon, Amy Poehler
tomatoConsensus: Underutilizing a talented cast, Mr. Woodcock lacks the comic energy and timing to make the most of its intriguing premise.
